person2.name: Jake Lang
person2.bio: I live and breathe WebAssembly. Former operating systems enthusiast working on various VM and compiler-related projects at Ewasm. Other interests include cryptography, grand strategy games, and occasionally neurochemistry.

person3.name: Jared Wasinger
person3.bio: Currently focused on development for EWASM in Eth2.0.  Previously a contributor on testing, EthereumJS and the Parity Ethereum client.

person4.name: Hugo De la cruz
person4.bio: Software Developer based in Mexico, working on ewasm (Ethereum WebAssembly), founder of Ethereum Guadalajara (ETHGDL).
